I'm Aaron, a builder

of websites, web apps, coworking space, wood working...

Designer

I am a designer who loves solving problems. I believe in user focused design and interfaces that are fun and easy to use. I love working each element on the screen to a pixel perfect design and then taking that and putting it into smart, rock solid markup.

Developer

I'm a solid front-end developer who's been working with developers in Ruby on Rails and other MVC frameworks for over five years. I excel at rapid prototyping and iterative development specializing in HTML/CSS/JS.

Builder

I like to call myself a builder. No matter what I need, weather it's a new feature in an app that requires a new technology that I need to learn, or a desk for a coworking space, I find a way to build it.

The Day Job

I work with an awesome group of people at Formstack as UX Developer. I work remotely from Bloomington, IN.

Side Project

My latest side project was Barley Themer where I hope to releaseing a theme every month or close to that.

Side Project

I recently co-founded Cowork Btown in Bloomington, IN. It's been an unbelievably rewarding project.
